project.name: OTF RF2 Admin Quality Assurance
project.description: OTF RF2 Administrator Tools to Run Quality Assurance Checks

property.name: Reports have unique timestamp for definition and project
property.value: select mapProjectId, name, from_unixtime(timestamp/1000) from reports group by mapProjectId, name, from_unixtime(timestamp/1000) having count(*)>1;

property.name: Validate non-rule based projects have empty rules
property.value: SELECT mapRecord_id, id, rule FROM map_entries WHERE rule != '' AND mapRecord_id in (SELECT id FROM map_records WHERE mapProjectId in (SELECT id FROM map_projects WHERE ruleBased = 0));

property.name: Validate rule based projects never have empty rules
property.value: SELECT mapRecord_id, id, rule FROM map_entries WHERE rule = '' AND mapRecord_id in (SELECT id FROM map_records WHERE mapProjectId in (SELECT id FROM map_projects WHERE ruleBased = 1));

property.name: Validate map entry targetId is never null
Validate map entry targetName is "No target" when targetId is blank
Validate active concept default preferred names - SNOMEDCT
property.value: SELECT terminologyId, defaultPreferredName FROM concepts a WHERE a.active = 1 AND terminology = 'SNOMEDCT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM descriptions b, language_refset_members c WHERE a.id = b.concept_id AND b.active = 1 AND c.active = 1 AND b.id = c.description_id AND b.typeId='900000000000003001' AND c.refSetId = '900000000000509007' AND c.acceptabilityId = '900000000000548007' AND a.defaultPreferredName = b.term);

property.name: Validate concept default preferred names - not SNOMEDCT
property.value: SELECT terminologyId, defaultPreferredName FROM concepts a WHERE terminology != 'SNOMEDCT' AND defaultPreferredName not like '% - %' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM descriptions b WHERE a.id = b.concept_id AND a.defaultPreferredName = b.term);

property.name: Validate active concepts have tree positions
property.value: SELECT terminologyId, defaultPreferredName FROM concepts a WHERE active = 1 AND terminology='SNOMEDCT' and terminologyId != '26383008' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tree_positions b WHERE a.terminologyId = b.terminologyId AND a.terminology = b.terminology AND a.terminologyVersion = b.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Validate map project source terminology exists
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.sourceTerminology FROM map_projects a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts b WHERE a.sourceTerminology = b.terminology AND a.sourceTerminologyVersion = b.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Validate map project destination terminology exists
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.destinationTerminology FROM map_projects a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts b WHERE a.destinationTerminology = b.terminology AND a.destinationTerminologyVersion = b.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Map project refSetId exists in concepts
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.name, refSetId, refSetName FROM map_projects a WHERE a.name not like 'Published%' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts b WHERE a.refSetId = b.terminologyId AND a.sourceTerminology = b.terminology AND a.sourceTerminologyVersion = b.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Map project scope concepts should exist
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM map_projects a, map_projects_scope_concepts b WHERE a.id = b.id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts c WHERE b.scopeConcepts = c.terminologyId AND a.sourceTerminology = c.terminology AND a.sourceTerminologyVersion = c.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Map project scope excluded concepts should exist
property.value: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM map_projects a, map_projects_scope_excluded_concepts b WHERE a.id = b.id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts c WHERE b.scopeExcludedConcepts = c.terminologyId AND a.sourceTerminology = c.terminology AND a.sourceTerminologyVersion = c.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Every map record should have a valid concept
property.value: SELECT b.id, a.conceptId FROM map_records a, map_projects b WHERE mapProjectId = b.id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts c WHERE a.conceptId = c.terminologyId AND b.sourceTerminology = c.terminology AND b.sourceTerminologyVersion = c.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Every map entry should have a valid targetId (if not empty)
property.value: SELECT b.conceptId, c.id, a.targetId FROM map_entries a, map_records b, map_projects c WHERE a.mapRecord_id = b.id AND b.mapProjectId = c.id AND targetId != '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM concepts d WHERE a.targetId = d.terminologyId AND c.destinationTerminology = d.terminology AND c.destinationTerminologyVersion = d.terminologyVersion);

property.name: Every feedback should belong to a legitimate project
property.value: SELECT terminologyId, mapProjectId FROM feedback_conversations WHERE mapProjectId NOT IN (SELECT id FROM map_projects);

property.name: Every feedback should belong to a legitimate record
property.value: SELECT terminologyId, mapProjectId, mapRecordId, terminology, terminologyVersion FROM feedback_conversations a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_records_AUD b, map_projects c WHERE a.terminologyId = b.conceptId AND a.terminology = c.sourceTerminology AND a.terminologyVersion = c.sourceTerminologyVersion AND a.mapRecordId = b.id AND b.mapProjectId = c.id AND a.mapProjectId = b.mapProjectId);

property.name: A map record should have only a single feedback conversation
property.value: SELECT mapProjectId, mapRecordId FROM feedback_conversations GROUP BY mapProjectId, mapRecordId HAVING count(*)>1;

property.name: No orphaned report definitions
property.value: SELECT id, name FROM report_definitions a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects_report_definitions b WHERE a.id = b.reportDefinitions_id);

property.name: Map record origins should exist
property.value: SELECT * FROM map_records_origin_ids a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_records_AUD b WHERE a.originIds = b.id);

property.name: No orphaned advice
property.value: SELECT id, name FROM map_advices a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects_map_advices b WHERE a.id = b.mapAdvices_id);

property.name: No orphaned principles
property.value: SELECT id, name FROM map_principles a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects_map_principles b WHERE a.id = b.mapPrinciples_id);

property.name: No orphaned relations
property.value: SELECT id, name FROM map_relations a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects_map_relations b WHERE a.id = b.mapRelations_id);

property.name: No orphaned preset age ranges
property.value: SELECT id, name FROM map_age_ranges a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects_map_age_ranges b WHERE a.id = b.presetAgeRanges_id);

property.name: Workflow exceptions have valid projects
property.value: SELECT * FROM workflow_exceptions a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM map_projects b WHERE b.id = a.mapProjectId);

property.name: PUBLISHED or READY_FOR_PUBLICATION map records do not have tracking records
property.value: SELECT a.mapProjectId, a.id, a.conceptId, a.conceptName, a.workflowStatus FROM map_records a, tracking_records t WHERE a.workflowStatus in ('PUBLISHED', 'READY_FOR_PUBLICATION') and a.conceptId = t.terminologyId and a.mapProjectId = t.mapProjectId order by a.mapProjectId, a.conceptId;

property.name: Non-PUBLISHED and non-READY_FOR_PUBLICATION map records always have a tracking record
property.value: SELECT mapProjectId, a.id, workflowStatus FROM map_records a, concepts c WHERE workflowStatus not in ('PUBLISHED', 'READY_FOR_PUBLICATION') AND c.terminologyId = a.conceptId AND c.active = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tracking_records b WHERE a.mapProjectId = b.mapProjectId AND a.conceptId = b.terminologyId);

property.name: Empty target has only acceptable map relations
property.value: SELECT d.id, c.conceptId, b.name FROM map_entries a, map_relations b, map_records c, map_projects d WHERE a.mapRelation_id = b.id AND a.mapRecord_id = c.id AND c.mapProjectId = d.id AND a. targetId = '' AND isAllowableForNullTarget != 1;

property.name: Non empty target has only acceptable map relations
property.value: SELECT d.id, c.conceptId, b.name FROM map_entries a, map_relations b, map_records c, map_projects d WHERE a.mapRelation_id = b.id AND a.mapRecord_id = c.id AND c.mapProjectId = d.id AND a. targetId != '' AND a.targetId IS NOT null AND isAllowableForNullTarget != 0;

property.name: Empty target has only acceptable map advices
property.value: SELECT e.id, d.conceptId, b.name FROM map_entries a, map_advices b, map_entries_map_advices c, map_records d, map_projects e WHERE a.id = c.map_entries_id AND b.id = c.mapAdvices_id AND a.mapRecord_id = d.id AND d.mapProjectId = e.id AND a. targetId = '' AND b.isAllowableForNullTarget != 1;

property.name: Non empty target has only acceptable map advices
property.value: SELECT e.id, d.conceptId, b.name FROM map_entries a, map_advices b, map_entries_map_advices c, map_records d, map_projects e WHERE a.id = c.map_entries_id AND b.id = c.mapAdvices_id AND a.mapRecord_id = d.id AND d.mapProjectId = e.id AND a.targetId != '' AND a.targetId IS NOT NULL AND b.isAllowableForNullTarget != 0;
